did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Mario Castelnuovo-Tedesco Collection of Musical Works,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Performing Arts Special Collections

did.abstract: This collection consists of published scores and reproductions of manuscripts
did.physloc: Stored off-site at SRLF. Advance notice is required for access to the collection. Please contact the UCLA Performing Arts Special Collections for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been assigned to the UCLA Performing Arts Special Collections. All requests for permission to publish or quote from manuscripts must be submitted in writing to the Librarian for Performing Arts Special Collections. Permission for publication is given on behalf of the Performing Arts Special Collectionsas the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission of the copyright holder(s), which must also be obtained.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Advance notice required for access.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Mario Castelnuovo-Tedesco Collection of Musical Works, 117, Performing Arts Special Collections, University of California, Los Angeles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of published scores and reproductions of manuscripts.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Music--Italy--20th century--Scores.

did.unittitle: Leaves of Grass. Ozalid copy of autograph ms. (15-30 Giugno [June], 1936). 35p.

scopecontent.p: 1. What think you I take my pen in hand?; 2. I dream'd in a dream; 3. Sometimes with one I love; 4. We two boys together clinging; 5. Are you the new person drawn toward me?; 6. When I peruse the conquer'd fame; 7. A glimpse; 8. This moment, yearning and thoughtful; 9. Trickle, drops!; 10. The base of all metaphysics. For voice and piano.
